ruleContent.content:
<js>
function decrypt(a, b, c) { 
	return java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS7Padding", b, c).decryptStr(a)
 };
try{
	result=src.replace(
		/<script>\s*(decrypt.*;)\s*<.?script>/g,(html,code)=>eval(String(code)) );
	}catch(err){
		java.log(err)
		//如果解密出错，记录日志并使用webView动态加载解密
		result=java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
		}finally result;
</js>
#txtcontent@textNodes||.txtnav@textNodes
<js>tzs(result)</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
$ = java.getString(".infoWen@html");
n = 0; 
v = String(book.getVariable("custom"));
x = v.match(/^\d+$/)? v : n;
x = parseInt(x) < $.length? x : n;
java.toast(x);

img = java.getString('[property="og:image"]@content');

if (v == 1) {
  bookUrlz = java.getString('source@src');
} else if(v==0){
  bookUrlz = baseUrl;
}

intro = "  简介：" + java.getString('[property="og:description"]@content') + "\n当前源链: " + bookUrlz+"\n文本简介:🔺'+0+'🔻"+baseUrl+
"\n音频链接:🔺'+1+'🔻"+java.getString('source@src');
data = {
  intro: intro,
  img: img,
  bookUrl: bookUrlz
};

JSON.stringify(data);
</js>

ruleContent.title: .t-t@h1@text

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let list = [];
if (baseUrl.match(/audio/)) {
  book.type = 32;
  java.toast('已自动开启听书模式');
} else if (baseUrl.match(/huiben/)) {
  book.type = 64;
  java.toast('已自动开启漫画模式');
} else if (baseUrl.match(/g/)) {
  book.type = 8;
  java.toast('已自动开启小说模式');
}
let obj = {
  text: java.get('name'), 
  href:baseUrl
};
list.push(obj);
list
</js>

ruleContent.content: #nr1@html

searchUrl:
<js>
cookie.removeCookie(source.getKey());
url = "https://m.sdhear.com/api/search";
r = java.ajax(baseUrl);
s = r.match(/var\s\w+\s*=\s*"\w+";/g).join('');
eval(s);
//java.log(s)
var bd = {
  "method": "POST",
  "body": `q=${key}&vw=${vw}&abw=${abw}&ru=${ru}&jrt=${jrt}&van=${van}&fw=${fw}&cwl=${cwl}&gpr=${gpr}&uyoo=${uyoo}&tz=${tz}&euu=${euu}&tsn=${tsn}&eju=${eju}&um=${um}&fp=${fp}&dvm=${dvm}&jpk=${jpk}&deblkx=${deblkx}&ht=${ht}&azy=${azy}&sna=${sna}&wqx=${wqx}&fpp=${fpp}&rup=${rup}&jwj=${jwj}&bgt=${bgt}&qp=${qp}&yf=${yf}&cw=${cw}&wq=${wq}&sign=${sign}`
};

bjson = JSON.stringify(bd);
url + ',' + bjson;
</js>
